text: @realDonaldTrump @lgutwein99_31 In 111 days we’ve gone from our 1st covid19 death to 100,000 deaths from a pandemic you chose to ignore for 72 days. You have no business leading our nation. RESIGN ASAP! https://t.co/5n3y3u2iV8
